metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1380 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A slab-out-of-bound read problem was found in brcmf_get_assoc_ies indrivers/net/wireless/broadcom/brcm80211/brcmfmac/cfg80211.c in the LinuxKernel. This issue could occur when assoc_info->req_len data is bigger thanthe size of the buffer, defined as WL_EXTRA_BUF_MAX, leading to a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
